home.title: Melchior JORDA — Junior Web & Software Developer
home.subtitle: Crafting efficient, scalable, and user-focused digital solutions.

form.name: Name

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: A collection of selected projects. I'll add yours when you provide them.
projects.example_description: Demo: A performant SPA built with Vue and Tailwind.
projects.placeholder_description: Short description of the project using modern web stack.

minata-portfolio.title: From MY Window - Minata Sartori
minata-portfolio.description: Professional portfolio website for photographer and filmmaker Minata Sartori. Multi-page site featuring photography galleries, video projects, and radio work. Fully responsive with interactive media players.

trixie-conciergerie.title: Trixie Conciergerie
trixie-conciergerie.description: Luxury concierge services website for Saint-Tropez. Features booking system, service management, cleaning, gardening, and property maintenance. Modern responsive design with SEO optimization.

miss-boat.title: Miss Boat
miss-boat.description: Boat rental website for Cavalaire-sur-Mer (French Riviera). License-free boat rentals for ages 16+. Built with Vue.js, Vue Router, and Tailwind CSS. Features pricing page, gallery, contact information, and responsive design.

elsa-psychologue.title: Elsa Psychologue
elsa-psychologue.description: Professional website for psychologist Elsa. Clean and calming design with appointment booking, therapy information, and contact details. Built with modern web technologies and Firebase hosting.

les-planches.title: Les Planches
les-planches.description: Mediterranean restaurant website in Cavalaire-sur-Mer. Features animated image galleries for menu and drinks, smooth scroll effects, and responsive design. Modern tapas and wine bar near Saint-Tropez.

re-fresh-earth.title: Re-Fresh Earth
re-fresh-earth.description: Environmental platform fighting urban heat islands using AI and satellite data. NASA Space Apps Challenge project featuring predictive machine learning, real-time thermal mapping with Landsat/Sentinel-2/MODIS, and intuitive dashboard for urban planners. Case study: Málaga.

get-next-line.title: get_next_line
get-next-line.description: Function that reads a line from a file descriptor. A challenging project that handles buffer management and memory allocation.

ft-printf.title: ft_printf
ft-printf.description: Custom implementation of the printf function in C. Handles multiple format specifiers and conversions.

libft.title: Libft
libft.description: Custom C library with reimplemented standard functions. Foundation library for all future C projects.

personal-libft.title: Personal Libft
personal-libft.description: Extended version of the standard C library with additional utility functions. Enhanced libft with custom implementations for advanced string manipulation, memory management, and data structures.

push-swap.title: push_swap
push-swap.description: Sorting algorithm project that sorts data on a stack with a limited set of instructions. Implements efficient algorithms to sort integers using two stacks and specific operations.

so-long.title: so_long
so-long.description: 2D game project built with MiniLibX. Create a small game where a character collects items and finds an exit. Focuses on graphics programming, event handling, and game logic.

random-rgb.title: Random RGB
random-rgb.description: A generator of rgb color, see the color, and copy the rgb

form-with-regex.title: Form with Regex
form-with-regex.description: A form with regex for all the inputs.

random-password.title: Random Password
random-password.description: Here is a generator of random password, you can add how many letters, maj/min, numbers or special caracteres.

philosophers.title: Philosophers
philosophers.description: Dining philosophers concurrency project implemented in C using pthreads and mutexes. Simulation of N philosophers avoiding deadlock and starvation.

minishell.title: Minishell
minishell.description: A minimal shell implementation in C supporting parsing, execution, redirections, and builtins. Educational project following strict coding rules.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm Melchior JORDA, a junior software and web developer based in Málaga, Spain. Passionate about creating efficient and scalable digital solutions, I combine technical expertise from École 42 with hands-on experience in web development and video game testing. My diverse background in culinary arts has strengthened my attention to detail, time management, and teamwork skills.

game_tester.title: Video Game Tester at Localsoft
game_tester.description: Quality assurance testing for video games, bug reporting, collaboration with development teams, and adherence to strict testing methodologies.

web_dev.title: Web Development Projects
web_dev.description: Created professional websites for clients including photographers, restaurants, and service providers. Specialized in Vue.js, responsive design, and modern web technologies.

frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.description: Vue.js, JavaScript/TypeScript, HTML5/CSS3, Tailwind CSS, Responsive Design, Web Accessibility

backend.title: Backend & Systems
backend.description: C, PHP, Symfony, MySQL, Node.js, API Development, System Programming

tools.title: Tools & Methods
tools.description: Git/GitHub, VS Code, Testing & QA, Agile Methodologies, SEO Optimization

school42.title: École 42 — Common Core (2024-2025)
school42.description: Peer-to-peer learning in systems programming, algorithms, and software development. Projects include minishell, philosophers, and various C programming challenges.

eni.title: ENI School — Web & Mobile Developer Degree (2023-2024)
eni.description: Comprehensive training in web and mobile development, including frontend, backend, databases, and project management.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: From a young age, programming has brought my ideas to life. My culinary background made me versatile and I am a fast learner, with skills in organisation, creativity, teamwork and attention to detail.

game_tester.title: Video Game Tester – Localsoft
game_tester.description: As a LQA Tester at Localsoft, I analyzed bugs, wrote test reports, and collaborated with dev teams using client tools, sharpening my attention to detail and testing methodologies.

internship.title: Internship - Web Developer
internship.description: I improved in project management, autonomy and technology watch. I used VSCode, Bitbucket, Trello, Node.js, Electron.js, jQuery and MySQL. I also strengthened my teamwork. I developed a quiz app and a website for events.

chef.title: Chef
chef.description: My culinary experience honed my time management, attention to detail.

various.title: Various Roles
various.description: My experiences in home care and socio-educational work strengthened my adaptability and problem-solving skills.

auction.title: Online Auction Site
auction.description: Developed with HTML, Bootstrap, Java and JavaScript: This project improved my understanding of Object Oriented Programming (OOP).

event.title: Event Organisation Application
event.description: Built with Symfony, I developed skills in PHP, Twig, MySQL and tools like Figma, Trello, PhpStorm and PhpMyAdmin, strengthening my knowledge in web development.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: Experience in HTML/CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap and Angular to create dynamic and responsive interfaces.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: Proficient in PHP, Symfony, MySQL, Java and C, with experience in OOP for software development.

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Use of Github, Bitbucket, Trello, Figma and SEO for project management and optimised designs.

school42.description: Largest network of IT schools in the world

hobbies.title: Hobbies
hobbies.description: Passionate about beach-volley, travel (Asia, Oceania, Europe) and video games, especially management games and development with Unreal Engine.
